body_html:
I am having a similar issue, currently trying to use PyTorch on the newly-released Jetson Xavier:

import torch
print(torch.cuda.is_available())
t = torch.tensor([1., 2.], device='cuda')

Prints True before hanging (It's been close to 10mins).

I tried running strace, it seems to mostly output a bunch of brk instructions. Although the process hung, it's definitely running and periodically spits out a trace like the following, with the break addresses slowly increasing:

openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/index", O_RDWR) = 28                                                                                                                                               
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_RDLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
fstat(28, {st_mode=S_IFREG|0644, st_size=288, ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                     
lseek(28, 0, SEEK_SET)                  = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
read(28, "A\0\0\0\21\0\0\0\301=\21\2\0\0\0\0~\316\207C\260\305nh\0104\f\0\0\0\0\0"..., 4096) = 288                                                                                                          
openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/5/f/554dbd08f190d2", O_RDONLY) = -1 ENOENT (No such file or directory)                                                                                             
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_UNLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
close(28)                               = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
brk(0x3d7b0000)                         = 0x3d7b0000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3db0e000)                         = 0x3db0e000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3de6b000)                         = 0x3de6b000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e1ca000)                         = 0x3e1ca000                                                                                                                                                        
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
brk(0x3e1eb000)                         = 0x3e1eb000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e210000)                         = 0x3e210000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e231000)                         = 0x3e231000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e257000)                         = 0x3e257000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e2b8000)                         = 0x3e2b8000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e2f8000)                         = 0x3e2f8000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e338000)                         = 0x3e338000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e364000)                         = 0x3e364000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e385000)                         = 0x3e385000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3a6000)                         = 0x3e3a6000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3c9000)                         = 0x3e3c9000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3ea000)                         = 0x3e3ea000
body_text:
I am having a similar issue, currently trying to use PyTorch on the newly-released Jetson Xavier:
import torch
print(torch.cuda.is_available())
t = torch.tensor([1., 2.], device='cuda')
Prints True before hanging (It's been close to 10mins).
I tried running strace, it seems to mostly output a bunch of brk instructions. Although the process hung, it's definitely running and periodically spits out a trace like the following, with the break addresses slowly increasing:
openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/index", O_RDWR) = 28                                                                                                                                               
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_RDLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
fstat(28, {st_mode=S_IFREG|0644, st_size=288, ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                     
lseek(28, 0, SEEK_SET)                  = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
read(28, "A\0\0\0\21\0\0\0\301=\21\2\0\0\0\0~\316\207C\260\305nh\0104\f\0\0\0\0\0"..., 4096) = 288                                                                                                          
openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/5/f/554dbd08f190d2", O_RDONLY) = -1 ENOENT (No such file or directory)                                                                                             
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_UNLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
close(28)                               = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
brk(0x3d7b0000)                         = 0x3d7b0000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3db0e000)                         = 0x3db0e000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3de6b000)                         = 0x3de6b000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e1ca000)                         = 0x3e1ca000                                                                                                                                                        
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
brk(0x3e1eb000)                         = 0x3e1eb000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e210000)                         = 0x3e210000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e231000)                         = 0x3e231000

brk(0x3e2f8000)                         = 0x3e2f8000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e338000)                         = 0x3e338000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e364000)                         = 0x3e364000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e385000)                         = 0x3e385000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3a6000)                         = 0x3e3a6000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3c9000)                         = 0x3e3c9000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3ea000)                         = 0x3e3ea000
body:
I am having a similar issue, currently trying to use PyTorch on the newly-released Jetson Xavier:
```python
import torch
print(torch.cuda.is_available())
t = torch.tensor([1., 2.], device='cuda')
```
Prints `True` before hanging (It's been close to 10mins).

I tried running strace, it seems to mostly output a bunch of `brk` instructions. Although the process hung, it's definitely running and periodically spits out a trace like the following, with the break addresses slowly increasing:

```
openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/index", O_RDWR) = 28                                                                                                                                               
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_RDLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
fstat(28, {st_mode=S_IFREG|0644, st_size=288, ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                     
lseek(28, 0, SEEK_SET)                  = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
read(28, "A\0\0\0\21\0\0\0\301=\21\2\0\0\0\0~\316\207C\260\305nh\0104\f\0\0\0\0\0"..., 4096) = 288                                                                                                          
openat(AT_FDCWD, "/root/.nv/ComputeCache/5/f/554dbd08f190d2", O_RDONLY) = -1 ENOENT (No such file or directory)                                                                                             
fcntl(28, F_SETLK, {l_type=F_UNLCK, l_whence=SEEK_SET, l_start=0, l_len=0}) = 0                                                                                                                             
close(28)                               = 0                                                                                                                                                                 
brk(0x3d7b0000)                         = 0x3d7b0000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3db0e000)                         = 0x3db0e000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3de6b000)                         = 0x3de6b000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e1ca000)                         = 0x3e1ca000                                                                                                                                                        
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
ioctl(0, TCGETS, {B38400 opost isig icanon echo ...}) = 0                                                                                                                                                   
brk(0x3e1eb000)                         = 0x3e1eb000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e210000)                         = 0x3e210000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e231000)                         = 0x3e231000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e257000)                         = 0x3e257000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e2b8000)                         = 0x3e2b8000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e2f8000)                         = 0x3e2f8000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e338000)                         = 0x3e338000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e364000)                         = 0x3e364000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e385000)                         = 0x3e385000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3a6000)                         = 0x3e3a6000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3c9000)                         = 0x3e3c9000                                                                                                                                                        
brk(0x3e3ea000)                         = 0x3e3ea000
```
